downloadTitle: Certification Test Tool Preview for System Center 2016 – Management Packs
downloadDescription: Use this test tool to validate compatibility and certify your Management Pack for System Center 2016 certified logo.

downloadFile.name: MPR Test Tool Preview for System Center 2016 MP.msi
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/f/e/4/fe4b1e33-8b08-458f-a8c6-c2ced26aa57a/MPR Test Tool Preview for System Center 2016 MP.msi

detailsSection:
The Certification Test Tool for System Center 2016 is designed to help validate your Operations Manager Management Pack for compatibility and compliance to best practices.  Test Results Package generated from the test tool can be submitted as part of the logo certification program and Microsoft Partner Network competency requirements. 

This tool is also recommended for Customers to evaluate third party Management Packs for best practices.

Learn more about the Logo Certification at http://aka.ms/enterprisecloudcertified
detailsSection_file_name: MPR Test Tool Preview for System Center 2016 MP.msi
systemRequirementsSection:
Windoiws 10; Windows 8.1
Windows Server 2016; Windows Server 2012 R2
Do not require System Center or Operations Manager to be installed.
installInstructionSection:
Download and extract the test tool package. Navigate to the specified folder, launch the and follow directions of the wizard style tool.

The Test Tool execute a static analysis of Management Pack files provided.  

Installing System Center is not necessary for this test tool.
